result.arabic_text: وَإِمَّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي نَعِدُهُمۡ أَوۡ نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ
result.translation: 46.Nabiyow addunyal digaalak ken kah xagnisnaamak tu koo aybullee kee hinnay woh koo aybullee kalah koo warrayse akkenno (raba kinnuk) toysa ama namma caalatal inkih ken caagid nee fan yaduure, tohuk lakal ken taamoomiy usun addunyal abak sugeenil Yalli sumaaqah yaniih ken elle gaițele.
